full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA'I TSOGS MCHOD GSER GYI YANG ZHUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA'I TSOGS MCHOD GSER GYI YAN ZHUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE'I TSOGS MCHOD DNGOS GRUB MCHOG SBYIN LA GZHI BYAS NAS, GZHAN NAS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG TE RAB 'BYAMS PA SH'A SA NA MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,LUNG THOB, ,)
